centered.description: Determines whether the modal should be centered vertically, false by default
centered.description_zh: 确定模态框是否应垂直居中，默认为 false

closeButtonProps.description: Props passed down to the close button
closeButtonProps.description_zh: 传递到 close 按钮的 props

closeOnClickOutside.description: Determines whether the modal/drawer should be closed when user clicks on the overlay, true by default
closeOnClickOutside.description_zh: 确定当用户单击叠加层时是否应关闭模态框/抽屉，默认为 true

closeOnEscape.description: Determines whether onClose should be called when user presses the escape key, true by default
closeOnEscape.description_zh: 确定当用户按下 Esc 键时是否应调用 onClose，默认情况下为 true

fullScreen.description: Determines whether the modal should take the entire screen, false by default
fullScreen.description_zh: 确定模态框是否应占用整个屏幕，默认为 false

id.description: Id used to connect modal/drawer with body and title
id.description_zh: 用于将 modal/drawer 与 body 和 title 连接的 ID

keepMounted.description: If set modal/drawer will not be unmounted from the DOM when it is hidden, display: none styles will be added instead, false by default
keepMounted.description_zh: 如果 set modal/drawer 在隐藏时不会从 DOM 中卸载，则会添加 display： none 样式，默认为 false

lockScroll.description: Determines whether scroll should be locked when opened={true}, true by default
lockScroll.description_zh: 确定 scroll 是否应在 opened={true} 时锁定，默认情况下为 true

overlayProps.description: Props passed down to the Overlay component, use to configure opacity, background-color, styles and other properties
overlayProps.description_zh: 传递给 Overlay 组件的 props，用于配置 opacity、background-color、styles 和其他属性

padding.description: Key of theme.spacing or any valid CSS value to set content, header and footer padding, 'md' by default
padding.description_zh: theme.spacing 的键或任何有效的 CSS 值来设置内容、页眉和页脚填充，默认为 'md'

portalProps.description: Props passed down to the Portal component when withinPortal is set
portalProps.description_zh: 设置 withinPortal 时向下传递到 Portal 组件的 props

radius.description: Key of theme.radius or any valid CSS value to set border-radius, theme.defaultRadius by default
radius.description_zh: theme.radius 的键或任何用于设置 border-radius 的任何有效 CSS 值，默认为 theme.defaultRadius

removeScrollProps.description: Props passed down to react-remove-scroll, can be used to customize scroll lock behavior
removeScrollProps.description_zh: 传递给 react-remove-scroll 的 props 可用于自定义滚动锁定行为

returnFocus.description: Determines whether focus should be returned to the last active element when onClose is called, true by default
returnFocus.description_zh: 确定在调用 onClose 时是否应将焦点返回到最后一个活动元素，默认情况下为 true

scrollAreaComponent.description: Scroll area component, native div element by default
scrollAreaComponent.description_zh: 滚动区域组件，默认为原生 div 元素

shadow.description: Key of theme.shadows or any valid CSS box-shadow value, 'xl' by default
shadow.description_zh: theme.shadows 的键或任何有效的 CSS box-shadow 值，默认为 'xl'

size.description: Controls width of the content area, 'md' by default
size.description_zh: 控制内容区域的宽度，默认为 'md'

transitionProps.description: Props added to the Transition component that used to animate overlay and body, use to configure duration and animation type, { duration: 200, transition: 'pop' } by default
transitionProps.description_zh: 添加到 Transition 组件中的道具，用于对叠加层和 body 进行动画处理，用于配置持续时间和动画类型，默认为 { duration： 200， transition： 'pop' }

trapFocus.description: Determines whether focus should be trapped, true by default
trapFocus.description_zh: 确定是否应捕获焦点，默认为 true

withCloseButton.description: Determines whether the close button should be rendered, true by default
withCloseButton.description_zh: 确定是否应呈现关闭按钮，默认为 true

withOverlay.description: Determines whether the overlay should be rendered, true by default
withOverlay.description_zh: 确定是否应渲染叠加层，默认为 true

withinPortal.description: Determines whether the component should be rendered inside Portal, true by default
withinPortal.description_zh: 确定是否应在 Portal 中渲染组件，默认为 true

yOffset.description_zh: 顶部/底部模态偏移，默认为 5dvh

zIndex.description: z-index CSS property of the root element, 200 by default

onClose.description_zh: 在 modal/drawer 关闭时调用
